messages.zh: 第一关（后）
messages.en: Level 1 (Post-operation)

messages.zh: 成功撤出核心区！！
messages.en: We have succeeded in retreating from the core sector!

messages.zh: 优先确认敌情！
messages.en: Secure the area!

messages.zh: 我已经清理干净了。
messages.en: It’s been done

messages.zh: 杜宾！
messages.en: Dobermann!

messages.zh: 你平安无事就好......
messages.en: Thank god you’re safe….

messages.zh: 损伤状况清点完毕，两名干员轻伤，但还都能行动！
messages.en: Damage assessment complete, two operators have been lightly wounded. They are still capable of battle!

messages.zh: 抱歉，是我的失责，没能完整了解整合运动的战术。
messages.en: I’m sorry, it’s all my fault. I failed to see through the Reunion Movement’s tactic

messages.zh: 最开始我以为他们混在普通居民中。
messages.en: I thought they would be mixed in with the civilians in the crowd

messages.zh: 但当他们发动进攻时——
messages.en: But when they attacked—

messages.zh: 我才意识到整个人群中连一个普通居民也没有。
messages.en: I realized there wasn’t a single civilian in that crowd

messages.zh: 他们已经......谋划的这么周全了吗？怎么可能......
messages.en: They’ve already….planned to this extent? How….

messages.zh: 短程通讯设备也彻底失灵了。
messages.en: Short-distance coms are all down

messages.zh: 整合运动，究竟策划了什么？
messages.en: Reunion Movement, just what are they planning?

messages.zh: 我，我的天......我们是不是真的要完蛋了......
messages.en: M-My god, are we done for….

messages.zh: 罗德岛真值得他们如此大动干戈吗.......
messages.en: Was it really worth it for them to go for Rhodes Island like this?

messages.zh: 闹出这么大动静，切尔诺伯格当局可不会坐视不管啊！
messages.en: With the commotion this caused, Chernobog’s authorities aren’t just going to let this slide!

messages.zh: 冷静下来。
messages.en: Calm down
Hm? Instructor….?

messages.zh: 已经没有什么切尔诺伯格当局了。
messages.en: There’s no such Chernobog authorities anymore.
What—?!
